title: Tumblr introduces ad-free subscription for $5/month
content:
Tumblr is one of the most popular blogging platforms on the web, even after it banned adult content in 2018. The free service is primarily supported by advertisements, and now now Tumblr is joining Twitter in offering a premium subscription option. However, unlike Twitter Blue, Tumblr’s subscription actually removes advertisements. Tumblr announced in a blog

The post Tumblr introduces ad-free subscription for $5/month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Tumblr has launched a new ad-free feature, which removes advertisements from desktop and mobile Tumblr for $4.99 per month.
